oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Severy School, Vauxhall Place, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1907
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of the Severy School building, located at 112 Vauxhall Place, Nashville, Tennessee. This postcard states that “The Severy School opens September 12, 1907.” Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wills, Ridley, 1934-
Severy School (Nashville, Tenn.)
